title: REAL: THE LETTERS OF MINA HARKER AND SAM D'ALLESANDRO
description: Fiction. Nonfiction. Real contains letters between Dodie Bellamy (Mina Harker) and Sam D'Allesandro; the transcription of a story that was taped by D'Allesandro before he died in 1988; and a letter by Bellamy that concerns D'Allesandro's death.
author: Dodie Bellamy
